Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Minuet in D major, D Anh. I, 15

?

[IMSLP]

This dance is possibly spurious. In the Deutsch catalogue, the dance was originally numbered D 336 before being re-numbered to D Anh. I, 15.

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 74 · Sämtliche Tänze / Band I · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50022 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Alexander Weinmann

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2
